#summary - Database schema of the user, location, team, and other tables.
#labels Phase-Design,Phase-Requirements

= Database Schema =

== LOCATION ==

|| *Row name* || *Type* || *Notes*||  
|| id || int, primary key || ||
|| name || string || ||
|| latitude || double || ||
|| longitude || double || ||
|| owner_team_id || int, foreign key => `team` || ||
|| street || string || ||
|| city || string || ||
|| state || string || state, province, department, etc.||
|| zip || string || postal code ||
|| phone || int || ||
|| description || string || ||
|| image || string || ||

== USER ==

|| *Row name* || *Type* || *Notes* ||  
|| id || int, primary key || ||
|| passwordHash || string ||  ||
|| display_name || string, Required || ||
|| email_address || string, Required || ||
|| phone_number || int/string, Required for mobile app || ||
|| image || string || ||
|| creation_date || date || ||


== TEAM ==
|| *Row name* || *Type* || *Notes* ||
|| id || int, primary key || ||
|| team_name || string || ||
|| team_leader_id || int, foreign key => 'user' || ||
|| color || (string, enum?) || (could be a string as name or hex code, or enum from set of colors) ||
|| image || string || (team logo/icon) ||
|| description || string || ||
|| home_base || string || ||
|| creation_date || date || ||



== MEMBER ==
|| *Row name* || *Type* || *Notes* ||
||  id || int, primary key || ||
||  user_id || int, foreign key => `user` || ||
||  team_id || int, foreign key => `team` || || 

== FRIEND ==
|| *Row name* || *Type* || *Notes* ||
|| id || int, primary key || ||
|| primary_user_id || int, foreign key => `user` || ||
|| secondary_user_id || int, foreign key => `user` || || 
|| status || enum{'Pending', 'Accepted', 'Rejected'} || ||

== VISIT ==
|| id || (int, primary key) || ||
|| user_id || int, foreign key => `user` || ||
|| team_id || int, foreign key => `team` || ||
|| location_id  || int, foreign key => `location` || ||
